comments.content: Looking for ID of all fonts pls. Thanks, Alex

CHILI/12.00PM/THE LOAN: [Duke](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829160327/http:/www.losttype.com/font/?name=duke) (Regular and Fill)  
FRIDAY OCTOBER 28/COOK OFF: [Liberator](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829160327/http:/www.losttype.com/font/?name=liberator)  
The/Time/Place: according to the designer himself [Jacob Etter](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829160327/http:/dribbble.com/shots/300413-Chili-Cook-off-Poster?page=2) "It started as [Opti Sport-Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829160327/http:/typophile.com/node/70274), but I subtly altered it quite a bit." Alternative: [AZ Cut Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829160327/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/artistofdesign/az-cut-script)
Thanks man, props for the design and the text altering, its lovely!
